statements: SELECT influencer_id, reach, impressions, conversion_rates FROM InfluencerCampaignPerformance;
SELECT reach, impressions, influencer_id, conversion_rates FROM InfluencerCampaignPerformance;
SELECT impressions, influencer_id, conversion_rates, reach FROM InfluencerCampaignPerformance;
SELECT influencer_id, conversion_rates, reach, impressions FROM InfluencerCampaignPerformance;
SELECT influencer_id, impressions, reach, conversion_rates FROM InfluencerCampaignPerformance;
SELECT influencer_id, reach, impressions, conversion_rates FROM InfluencerCampaignPerformance WHERE reach > 1000 ORDER BY conversion_rates DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, impressions, reach, conversion_rates FROM InfluencerCampaignPerformance WHERE impressions BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT influencer_id, impressions, conversion_rates, reach FROM InfluencerCampaignPerformance WHERE reach < 5000 AND conversion_rates > 0.05 ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, reach, impressions, conversion_rates FROM InfluencerCampaignPerformance WHERE conversion_rates <= 0.1 OR reach >= 2000;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerCampaignPerformance WHERE influencer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, reach, impressions FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE influencer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM influencer_metrics WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT id, campaign_id, date, clicks FROM influencer_metrics WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(reach) AS total_reach FROM influencer_campaigns GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT id, campaign_name, reach, impressions FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE conversions_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY reach DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, reach, impressions, conversion_rate FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE impressions > 1000 ORDER BY conversion_rate;
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(clicks), SUM(engagements) FROM influencer_metrics GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING SUM(engagements) > 500;

SELECT campaign_name, date, clicks, engagements FROM influencer_campaigns c JOIN influencer_metrics m ON c.id = m.campaign_id WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY engagements DESC;
SELECT id, campaign_name, reach, impressions, conversion_rate FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE reach > 5000 AND impressions < 500 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_campaign_performance;
SELECT influencer_name, reach, conversion_rate FROM influencer_campaign_performance ORDER BY reach DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, influencer_name, impressions, conversion_rate FROM influencer_campaign_performance WHERE reach > 10000;
SELECT campaign_id, influencer_name, reach, impressions FROM influencer_campaign_performance ORDER BY campaign_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT influencer_name FROM influencer_campaign_performance;
SELECT influencer_name, reach, impressions, conversion_rate FROM influencer_campaign_performance WHERE reach > 100 AND impressions < 500
SELECT campaign_id, influencer_name, impressions FROM influencer_campaign_performance WHERE conversion_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY impressions DESC
SELECT campaign_id, date, impressions, clicks FROM reach_metrics WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT influencer_name, reach, conversion_rate FROM influencer_campaign_performance WHERE influencer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY reach DESC

SELECT reach_metrics.date, reach_metrics.impressions, conversion_rates.conversion_rate FROM reach_metrics JOIN conversion_rates ON reach_metrics.campaign_id = conversion_rates.campaign_id WHERE reach_metrics.impressions > 1000 AND conversion_rates.revenue > 5000 ORDER BY reach_metrics.date ASC
SELECT * FROM influencer_campaigns;
SELECT influencer_name, reach, impressions FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE id = 1;
SELECT engagement_date, engagement_value FROM campaign_engagements WHERE campaign_id = 2 ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, reach, conversion_rate FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE reach > 10000;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(conversion_value) AS total_conversions FROM campaign_conversions GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_conversions > 500;
SELECT influencer_name, reach, conversion_rate FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE reach > 1000 ORDER BY reach DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, engagement_value, engagement_date FROM campaign_engagements WHERE engagement_value > 0.5 ORDER BY engagement_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_value, conversion_date FROM campaign_conversions WHERE conversion_value > 100 ORDER BY conversion_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, reach, impressions, conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE conversions > 50 ORDER BY conversions DESC, impressions ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE influencer_name LIKE 'S%' AND conversion_rate > 0.5 AND reach BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY influencer_name ASC, reach DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerCampaigns ORDER BY influencer_name ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, reach, impressions FROM InfluencerCampaigns WHERE reach > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, reach_count, date FROM ReachMetrics WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT influencer_name, conversion_rate FROM InfluencerCampaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, tag_name FROM CampaignTags WHERE tag_name = 'marketing';
SELECT * FROM InfluencerCampaigns WHERE reach > 1000;
SELECT influencer_name, impressions FROM InfluencerCampaigns WHERE reach < 5000 ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT * FROM ImpressionsMetrics WHERE impression_count BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT campaign_id, date FROM ReachMetrics JOIN ConversionRates ON ReachMetrics.campaign_id = ConversionRates.campaign_id;
SELECT tag_name, COUNT(campaign_id) AS campaign_count FROM CampaignTags GROUP BY tag_name HAVING campaign_count > 2 ORDER BY campaign_count DESC;
